behavior observe_bathroom():
    body:
        foreach o: item:
            if is_bathroom(o) and not visited(o):
                observe(o, "Is this item a bathroom")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists bath: item : is_bathroom(bath) and visited(bath):
            bind bath: item where:
                is_bathroom(bath) and visited(bath)
            achieve close_char(char, bath)
        else:
            observe_bathroom()
